name: Potion Effect on Weapon
description: Take a weapon in your offhand, a potion in your mainhand and sneak+attack to pour the potion on the weapon.

actions.info: set potion id according to potion in mainhand
check if offhand item is incorrect

on-cooldown-over.info: also executes if there is no 'potion-weapon' in inventory

anti-cheat.info: makes sure that there is always at most 1 potion-weapon in the players inventory
